attributes.action: Repeal the decision to ban Tyler the Creator from entering the UK.
attributes.background:
The Government, especially the Home Secretary, continually feel that they have to use censorship as a weapon against those they deem unfit to enter OUR country. If the lyrics of a musician cause them to not be allowed in then why not the writers of violent and dark films or novels.
This is too far.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106748

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
